CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 2a Here we report another novel sidechain D-A conjugated copolymer ( PBDT-TDPP-S ) for highperformance PSCs , in which the BDT and thiophene units are conjugatedly formed the main chain and the di(thiophen-2yl)pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4(2H,5H)-dione ( TDPP ) units are pended onto the thiophenyl units to build the side chain by a linkage of a 2-vinylthiophenyl unit.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. PBDT - This is a novel sidechain conjugated copolymer.
2. TDPP - This is a specific unit in the sidechain of the PBDT conjugated copolymer, which is a di(thiophen-2yl)pyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4(2H,5H)-dione.
3. BDT - This is another unit in the main chain of the PBDT conjugated copolymer, which is a benzothieno[3,2-b]thiophene (BDT) unit.
4. 2-vinylthiophenyl - This is a linkage unit that connects the thiophenyl units in the sidechain of the PBDT conjugated copolymer.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name":

1. PBDT-TDPP-S - This is the Material Name of the novel sidechain conjugated copolymer.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name", presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PBDT-TDPP-S |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 2a Here we report another novel sidechain D-A conjugated copolymer ( PBDT-TDPP-S ) for highperformance PSCs , in which the BDT and thiophene units are conjugatedly formed the main chain and the di(thiophen-2yl)pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4(2H,5H)-dione ( TDPP ) units are pended onto the thiophenyl units to build the side chain by a linkage of a 2-vinylthiophenyl unit.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Value" entities:

1. "Property Value" of "PBDT-TDPP-S": This is a novel sidechain conjugated copolymer with the property of high performance PSCs (Photovoltaic Solar Cells).
2. "Property Value" of "BDT": This stands for the Building Block Unit, which is a conjugated polymer unit in the main chain of the copolymer.
3. "Property Value" of "TDPP": This stands for the Thiophene-3,4-dione Pendant Unit, which is a pendent unit attached to the thiophenyl units in the copolymer.
4. "Property Value" of "2-vinylthiophenyl unit": This is a linkage unit that connects the BDT and TDPP units in the copolymer.

In summary, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are the novel sidechain conjugated copolymer (PBDT-TDPP-S), the building block unit (BDT), the pendant unit (TDPP), and the linkage unit (2-vinylthiophenyl unit).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. "Property Value" of "PBDT-TDPP-S": This refers to the value of the material property of the novel sidechain conjugated copolymer (PBDT-TDPP-S) for high performance PSCs (Photovoltaic Solar Cells).

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
